author: MESSINA
post_text: May 15, 2019 at 4:28 PM#1Hi allI am looking to build a macro to do the following:>scrape 0. presets for a specific range of fixtures in a sequence>store them with those 0. presets in another sequence (leaving out cues that the fixture doesn't change its preset value..cue only)>the assign the fixture to full in the new sequence only if there is a 0. preset value if there is not have the intensity stay at 0>bonus if the new cues in the sequence can have the same cue number as the preset*note the range of fixtures may have presets that are different and should be stored in separate cues as defined by a specific preset.**more or less what i am trying to do is to extract multiple presets from a range of fixtures in a show sequence to store in a separate utility sequence so i can clean up used preset focuses when fixtures are swapped or moved etc....
title: Preset Scrape for utility sequence
